climbs.name: Six Weeks Vacation
climbs.fa: Kenn Kenaga and Pat Brennan, September 2000

content.description: A nice bottom to top crack, mostly hands, that passes a ledge partway.
content.protection: Gear to 2.5 inches, bolted rap anchors
content.location: This is the left crack of three on the south face.

climbs.name: Cat's Litter
climbs.fa: Eric Tipton, Jeff Brennan and Pat Brennan, September 2001

content.description: Climb a short wide crack to a ledge atop a block and then wiggle up a flared chimney to a ledge. Higher an easier wide crack curves upward to finish in a notch at the top of the formation.
content.protection: Gear to 4+ inches, bolt rap anchors
content.location: This is the right of three cracks on the south face.

climbs.name: Cat Box
climbs.fa: Pat Brennan, Jeff Brennan and Eric Tipton, September 2001

content.description: Climb large features to a ledge with a curving thin crack for protection then continue up the wider crack that leads directly to a notch at the top of the formation.
content.protection: Gear to 4 inches, bolted rap anchors
content.location: This is the middle crack of three on the south face.
